pages.text: The bright red crimson forest is probably the most lively nether biome there is. The dense forest of $(l:blocks/nether_wood)grown crimson fungi$() is populated by both $(l:mobs/piglin)piglins$() and $(l:mobs/hoglin)hoglins$(). You should probably not go in there unequipped, as both piglins (if you don't wear $(l:items/gold)golden$() armor) and hoglins can get annoying very quickly.
